ssc_addon.warning.frost_pawglove_incompa: Incompatible mana structure, Frost Pawglove cannot function in this form.
tooltip.ssc_addon.launcher.usage: Hold Right Click to rapid fire
tooltip.ssc_addon.portable_fridge.desc: Equipped in Back Slot: Refills Launcher every 0.5s, Regeneration Charge every 2s
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_sp.titl:
‘When the curse merges completely with the moonlight, you are no longer just a familiar...
You are the agent of the Spirit Realm, master of the Blue Flame’

Exclusive Accessories/Tools: Blue Fire Amulet
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_sp.appe: Your body hasn't changed much, but your soul has been thoroughly eroded by the moon's curse. It grants you more power, but also more curses.
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_sp.pros:
Master of the Spirit Realm
The magic within you has sublimated into a higher form, granting you unparalleled power:

Blue Fire Ring: You can activate a Blue Fire Ring around you. It continuously consumes mana to damage and inflicting severe burning on nearby enemies. While active, your Soul Reaping ability is greatly enhanced.

Fox Fire Breath: Consumes mana to breathe devastating Soul Fox Fire forward, dealing instant damage and igniting enemies for a long duration.

Soul Reaping: As a spiritual entity, you can draw power from fading lives. Killing targets restores a large amount of mana. If the Blue Fire Ring is active, kills also restore health and energy.

Mana Absorption: You can drain life essence directly from creatures, gaining mana and saturation. You can also slowly gather residual energy from the previous Cursed Moon from the atmosphere.

Spirit Embodiment: You are no longer mere flesh and blood, but a hybrid of flesh and mana. Thus, you are immune to more status effects, good or bad. With enhanced control over spiritual energy, when your mana is sufficient, overflowing mana forms a shield around you, reducing some damage.

Additionally, you retain all previous abilities: Illagers see you as an ally, you can see through creatures, and move freely through sweet berry bushes.
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_sp.cons:
Great power requires a huge price to maintain:

As a high-ranking spirit, your dependence on mana is more severe. Low or exhausted mana makes you weak and increases damage taken. Moreover, due to excessive absorption of moonlight power, your stored mana is near its limit. Absorbing too much more may cause you to explode like an overfilled balloon.

Your physical structure remains fragile; your health is no higher than a normal familiar.
You cannot equip leggings or boots, and move slowly in water.
You gain less saturation from food.
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_sp.inst:
Your control over spiritual power has reached another level, but your soul is more severely eroded by the Moon Curse. You feel yourself losing control over your body, constantly urged to unleash the Soul Fire within and burn everything in your path.
You have become a puppet of the moon, craving destruction and chaos.
You can no longer absorb the moon's mana because your body has reached its limit.
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_kill: Restores 15 Mana on kill. If Blue Fire Ring is active, restores an additional 5 Mana and 3 Health.
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_blue: Requires full Mana to activate. Consumes Mana per second to damage and ignite surroundings. Enhances kill restoration when active.
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_fox_: Consumes 25 Mana to breathe Soul Fox Fire forward, dealing 6 damage and igniting enemies for 10 seconds.
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_abso: Sneak and right-click a mob to consume Mana and drain its life essence. Depending on the target, gain healing, saturation, or special materials.
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_no_b: As a powerful spirit, you are immune to poison, hunger, nausea, etc., and fire damage (but still fear Soul Fire).
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_debu: Mana < 10%: -20% Attack/Speed/Mining. Mana < 3%: -60% stats and increased damage taken. Running out of Mana is torture.
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_mana: Passively regenerates 1 Mana every 20 seconds. Even when still, moonlight slowly returns.
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_init: Start with 100 Mana upon gaining the form, ready for battle.
power.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_sp_dama: Gain 20% damage reduction when Mana is above 50.
item.ssc_addon.active_coral_necklace.des: A necklace of active coral, bringing more vitality to the wearer
item.ssc_addon.sp_upgrade_thing.tooltip: A cross ring condensed from moonlight, allowing you to absorb more curses, but not increasing your max curse tolerance.
item.ssc_addon.blue_fire_amulet.tooltip_: Sealed with the magic of an ancient red fox
message.ssc_addon.evolution.success: “Excellent…” The moonlight whispers in your mind, closer and clearer than ever. With the whisper comes unparalleled power. You embraced evolution, meaning you embraced a deeper hug of the curse. It is a dangerous symbiosis, and you can no longer separate.
message.ssc_addon.red_transformation_spe: You merged with the power of the cursed moon, but your body seems to have temporarily transformed into a 'special' form. You only want to protect your teammates; for them, you can sacrifice your life.
message.ssc_addon.red_revert_timeout: You came back to your senses and realized your appearance had returned to its original form. You felt confused, but how could the characters in the story be real?
item.ssc_addon.lifesaving_cat_tail.toolt: A tail from another cat, perhaps it can prevent death
item.ssc_addon.frost_amulet.tooltip.2: The ice crystals inside change like brilliant fireworks
item.ssc_addon.phantom_bell.desc.1: A bell as cunning as a fox, allowing you to escape in critical moments.
item.ssc_addon.phantom_bell.desc.2: But it might also teleport you to your grave.
power.my_addon.wild_cat_sp_lifesaving_ta: A tail from another cat, perhaps it can prevent death
item.ssc_addon.evolution_stone.tooltip:
A living energy core fused from five shadow shards in a dark night ritual.
Sealed within are veins of sculk, embers of the hunt, bedrock of shadow, ribbons of night vision, and the void of the end.
It awaits to unleash its true power.
item.ssc_addon.shadow_shard.tooltip:
The ink-black fragment refracts a Netherite-like metallic luster. Its texture is incredibly heavy and hard,
like the toughest bedrock deep in the earth. It silently absorbs all surrounding light.
item.ssc_addon.night_vision_shard.toolti:
Inside this translucent turquoise fragment, golden light dust swirls slowly like quicksand.
Holding it feels as light as a Phantom, faintly bringing a clear vision like Night Vision.
item.ssc_addon.ender_shard.tooltip:
Deep within the fragment lies swirling starry purple and dragon-breath-like lilac clouds, with occasional Ender particles flashing by.
It seems to resonate with the distant End Void, causing a sense of uneasy palpitation.
item.ssc_addon.hunt_shard.tooltip:
The fragment displays a color of interwoven dark red and charcoal black, with edges scorching like lava. Listen carefully,
it seems to seal the roar of Blazes and the wail of Ghasts, radiating an endless thirst for battle.
item.ssc_addon.sculk_shard.tooltip:
This deep purple crystal fragment is cold to the touch, with cyan veins pulsing slowly inside like Sculk veins.
When you get close, you can hear faint echoes, as if countless eyes are staring at you from the dark.
message.ssc_addon.evolution_stone.succes: The Evolution Stone has merged into your body
message.ssc_addon.evolution_stone.no_res: The Evolution Stone does not respond to your request
item.ssc_addon.coral_ball.tooltip: A colorful ball made of various corals
item.ssc_addon.invisibility_cloak.toolti: Increases True Invisibility duration by 2s, but increases cooldown by 2s.
power.my_addon.form_axolotl_sp_rain_wetn: Slowly restores Moisture (Air) when exposed to rain, keeping you moist even on land.
power.my_addon.form_axolotl_sp_natural_r: Your natural regeneration speed is 20% faster than a normal Axolotl.
power.my_addon.form_axolotl_sp_play_dead: Actively enter Play Dead state for 6s. Gain Blindness and Immobility, remove all mob aggro, provide Regeneration III and reduce incoming damage by 90%. 36s Cooldown.
power.my_addon.form_axolotl_sp_water_bal: Trigger Water Burst when switching from sprinting to sneaking on ground, dealing higher damage than normal Axolotls. Consumes 5% Moisture.
power.my_addon.form_axolotl_sp_water_spe: Sneak + Right Click with an Arrow in offhand to craft a Water Spear. Consumes 10% Moisture and 1 Arrow. Water Spear applies Slowness II for 5s on hit.
power.my_addon.form_axolotl_sp_vortex_im: Create a vortex around yourself, pulling enemies in for 3s, then launching them and dealing 12 damage. Reduces incoming damage by 30% during skill. Consumes 20% Moisture.
origin.my_addon.form_axolotl_sp.name: SP Axolotl
origin.my_addon.form_axolotl_sp.descript: The spiritual evolution of the Axolotl, possessing powerful water skills.
message.ssc_addon.evolution.fail.no_moon: The metamorphosis to the essence requires the cursed moonlight as the final key. At this moment, the keyhole is empty—evolution has fallen silent.
message.ssc_addon.evolution.fail.bad_for: Current form is insufficient to carry echoes of older pacts. Evolution refuses to resonate deep within the bloodline; a deeper link cannot be established.
message.ssc_addon.evolution.fail.both: The foundation is too shallow, and the cursed rain has not fallen. In this double barrenness, the seedling of evolution has withered irretrievably.
message.ssc_addon.evolution.fail.already: Your attempt to establish a deeper link with the moonlight triggered a fatal resonance. Your form rejected evolution and returned the power of the curse—in the violent backlash, you became a brief, shrill echo under this cursed moon.
death.attack.cursed_erosion: %1$s was eroded by the power of the Cursed Moon
death.attack.cursed_burst: %1$s was burst by the power of the Cursed Moon
codex.status.my_addon.SP_status:
The Curse and Moonlight have completely synchronized; your soul has fully merged with that power.
Every breath you take resonates with the endless moonlight, a source of both power and pain.
codex.status.my_addon.familiar_fox_red_s: You feel your body is very light, as if it does not belong to this world.
codex.status.my_addon.wild_cat_sp_status: The Evolution Stone has merged into your body, and you feel unparalleled power filling you.
codex.status.my_addon.snow_fox_sp_status: The Evolution Stone has merged into your body, and you feel unparalleled power filling you.
codex.form.my_addon.snow_fox_sp.title:
'When the curse merges completely with the arctic storm, you are no longer just a snow fox...
You are the embodiment of the North, master of the blizzard'

Exclusive Accessory/Tool: Blizzard Tank
codex.form.my_addon.snow_fox_sp.appearan: Your fur is as white as eternal snow, and your eyes glimmer with piercing cold light. Where you walk, the air condenses into frost. Your body radiates a chill that not even the hottest summer can dispel.
codex.form.my_addon.snow_fox_sp.pros:
Frost Spirit
You command the power of extreme cold to strike your enemies:

Snow Spike Dash: Consumes Frost, dash instantly towards your crosshair, dealing high physical damage with kinetic frost energy and inflicting Frost Freeze (greatly reducing speed/attack speed and increasing damage taken).

Teleport Attack: Use the cover of snow to teleport behind multiple enemies for a surprise attack. Deals increased damage to frozen targets.

Frost Ball: Launch a gravity-defying magic ice ball that inflicts Frost Fall, slowing enemies down.

Frost Storm: Channel power to summon a local frost storm. The storm continuously pulls in surrounding enemies and inflicts physical cutting damage with countless sharp icicles.

Additionally, you retain the traits of a snow fox and are completely immune to cold.
codex.form.my_addon.snow_fox_sp.cons:
Great ice power comes at a cost:

All active skills consume 'Frost'.

When Frost is depleted, you cannot cast skills and may become vulnerable.

You need to manage your energy wisely or equip a Blizzard Tank to assist in combat.
codex.form.my_addon.snow_fox_sp.instinct:
You crave the cold and detest the heat.
You may feel uncomfortable in high-temperature environments.
You have a natural affinity for snowballs and snow blocks, and the Blizzard Tank can be of great assistance.
origin.my_addon.form_snow_fox_sp.name: SP Snow Fox
origin.my_addon.form_snow_fox_sp.descrip: The sublimated form of a snow fox under the power of the Evolution Stone, controlling extreme cold magic and physical power.
codex.form.my_addon.axolotl_sp.title:
'When the curse merges completely with the essence of water, you are no longer just an Axolotl...
You are the controller of the abyss, master of the vortex'

Exclusive Accessories/Tools: Axolotl Humidifier
codex.form.my_addon.axolotl_sp.appearanc: Your body becomes more transparent, shimmering with faint water light. Your skin seems to merge with the surrounding moisture, creating ripple-like waves with every move.
codex.form.my_addon.axolotl_sp.pros:
Abyssal Overlord
Your control over water elements has reached a new height, granting powerful water skills:

Water Spear Crafting: Use arrows and moisture to condense a temporary Water Spear. Melee range and damage equal to a Trident; inflicts Slowness on hit.

Vortex Impact: Create a powerful vortex centered on yourself, pulling nearby enemies. Explodes after 3s, launching enemies and dealing high damage. Reduces damage taken by 30% during the skill.

Play Dead: Actively enter Play Dead state, removing all mob aggro, rapidly regenerating health, and greatly reducing damage taken.

Rain Hydration: Restore moisture in rain.

Rapid Metabolism: Natural regeneration speed increased by 20%.

Additionally, you retain all previous abilities: Water Breathing, Underwater Vision, Increased Swim Speed, etc.
codex.form.my_addon.axolotl_sp.cons:
Powerful water abilities require moisture to maintain:

All active skills consume moisture.

Movement speed is still slow on land.

You still cannot wear helmets.

As a carnivore, you can only eat meat.
codex.form.my_addon.axolotl_sp.instincts:
Your perception of water elements has peaked, but your body has become more dependent on water. You can sense distant water bodies and always crave to return to the water.
Even on land, rain brings you solace.
message.ssc_addon.inhibitor.fail.sp_form: The inhibitor cannot revert this form
power.my_addon.true_invisibility.name: True Invisibility
power.my_addon.true_invisibility.descrip: Press to enter true invisibility state, undetectable by any creature. Attacking, mining, or using items breaks invisibility (glass shatter sound). Press again to cancel (cat hiss sound). Any exit triggers a 12s Cooldown.
power.my_addon.true_invisibility_dash.de: While invisible, press secondary key to break concealment and dash 5 blocks forward. Upon landing (or after 2s), stuns enemies within an 8-block radius for 1.5s. Stunned enemies cannot move, attack, use items, or turn camera. Wild Cats are immune.
power.my_addon.wild_cat_sp_speed_passive: Movement speed increased by 10% at night, decreased by 10% during the day.
power.my_addon.wild_cat_sp_night_strengt: All damage dealt increased by 1 at night.
power.my_addon.wild_cat_sp_diet.name: Feral Diet
power.my_addon.wild_cat_sp_diet.descript: Hunger restored by raw food increased by 100%.
power.my_addon.wild_cat_sp_ink_blind.des: Right-click while holding an Ink Sac in main hand to consume one and inflict Blindness for 3s on mobs within 5 blocks of diameter. 1.5s Cooldown.
origin.my_addon.form_wild_cat_sp.name: Wild Cat (SP)
origin.my_addon.form_wild_cat_sp.descrip: A special variant form of the wild cat.
codex.form.my_addon.wild_cat_sp.title:
'When power of the wild awakens completely, you are no longer just a wild cat...
You are the ghost of the jungle, the hunter of the night'
codex.form.my_addon.wild_cat_sp.appearan: Your body looks no different from a normal feral cat, but your eyes gleam with a more dangerous light, and your fur shimmers mysteriously under the moonlight.
codex.form.my_addon.wild_cat_sp.pros:
Moonlight Phantom
True Invisibility: You can actively enter complete invisibility. Attacking or using items breaks it. While invisible, you can use 'Stun Dash' or 'Weakness Spotting'.

Ink Blindness: Right-click with Ink Sac to blind nearby creatures momentarily, aiding escape or offense.

Night Walker: When night falls, your body becomes light, significantly increasing movement speed.

Power of the Night: At night, your attacks become more deadly, dealing increased damage.

Feral Diet: Your digestive system returns to the primitive state; eating raw meat (like raw beef, raw porkchop, etc.) grants double food and saturation.

Additionally, you retain all feral cat instincts:
Silent Steps, Creeper Deterrent, No Fall Damage, Phantom Scare.
codex.form.my_addon.wild_cat_sp.cons:
Price of the Wild:

Day/Night Dependence: Agile at night, but sluggish in sunlight.

Equipment Limit: You cannot wear leggings or boots as they hinder your agility.
codex.form.my_addon.wild_cat_sp.instinct: Your wild instincts have reached their peak, but your soul has also been eroded by the Moon Curse. You feel a stronger connection to the jungle, always yearning to hunt in the darkness.
text.autoconfig.ssc-addon.title: Shape Shifter Curse Addon Settings
text.autoconfig.ssc-addon.option.bookLan: Select the language for the generated Story Book (Forgotten Legend). Requires restart.
message.ssc_addon.cursed_moon_sp_special: Strangely, it doesn't seem to have any visible effect on your body... Perhaps your current form is rather [special]?
origin.my_addon.form_familiar_fox_red.de: A Red variant form of the Familiar Fox.
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_red.tit:
‘When the curse merges completely with the moonlight, you are no longer just a familiar...
You have broken free from Selena's control, becoming the agent of the Spirit Realm, master of the Blue Flame’
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_red.app: Looks like an evolved familiar, but wearing a pair of potion bags. Resembles a familiar from a certain story.
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_red.pro:
Master of the Spirit Realm
The magic within you has sublimated into a higher form, granting you unparalleled power:

Blue Fire Ring: You can activate a Blue Fire Ring around you. It continuously consumes mana to damage and inflict severe burning on nearby enemies. While active, your Soul Reaping ability is greatly enhanced.

Fox Fire Breath: Consumes mana to breathe devastating Soul Fox Fire forward, dealing instant damage and igniting enemies for a long duration.

Soul Reaping: As a spiritual entity, you can draw power from fading lives. Killing targets restores a large amount of mana. If the Blue Fire Ring is active, kills also restore health and energy.

Mana Absorption: You can drain life essence directly from creatures, gaining mana and saturation. You can also slowly gather residual energy from the previous Cursed Moon from the atmosphere.

Spirit Embodiment: You are no longer mere flesh and blood, but a hybrid of flesh and mana. Thus, you are immune to more status effects, good or bad. With enhanced control over spiritual energy, when your mana is sufficient, overflowing mana forms a shield around you, reducing some damage.

Additionally, you retain all previous abilities: you can see through creatures and move freely through sweet berry bushes.
codex.form.my_addon.familiar_fox_red.con:
Great power requires a huge price to maintain:

As a high-ranking spirit, your dependence on mana is more severe. Low or exhausted mana makes you weak and increases damage taken. Moreover, due to excessive absorption of moonlight power, your stored mana is near its limit. Absorbing too much more may cause you to explode like an overfilled balloon.

Your physical structure remains fragile; your health is no higher than a normal familiar.
You cannot equip leggings or boots, and move slowly in water.
You gain less saturation from food.
item.ssc_addon.potion_bag.tooltip: Red's exclusive potion storage bag, can only store potions, max 8 per slot
origin.my_addon.form_allay_sp.name: SP Allay
origin.my_addon.form_allay_sp.descriptio: The special evolved form of the Allay, possessing flight and amethyst abilities.
codex.status.my_addon.allay_sp_status: The Curse and Moonlight have completely synchronized; your soul has fully merged with that power.
codex.form.my_addon.allay_sp.title:
'When the curse merges completely with the resonance of amethyst, you are no longer just an Allay...
You are the embodiment of melody, master of crystal sound'
codex.form.my_addon.allay_sp.appearance: Your body emits a pale blue glow, wings gently beating the air as you float in mid-air. Your very existence is a silent symphony.
codex.form.my_addon.allay_sp.pros:
Crystal Sound
You command the resonant power of amethyst:

Mass Purification: Charge for 1.5s to purify all potion effects from entities in a large radius and interrupt other SP forms' active skills.

Group Heal: Charge for 3s to consume all mana and heal all entities in a large radius for a massive amount. Taking damage interrupts the charge.

Trade Discount: Due to your cute appearance, you get a Hero of the Village II discount when trading with villagers.

Levitation Flight: You can float in the air by pressing the jump key, but it consumes hunger.

Amethyst Food: You can only eat Amethyst Shards to restore hunger. Eating them creates a resonance explosion, damaging nearby enemies and healing yourself.

Ranged Enhancement: Your ranged attack damage is greatly increased.

Hit Recovery: You can recover health when dealing enough damage.

Creature Sensing: You can see glowing outlines of nearby creatures.

Jukebox Healing: You slowly recover health near a playing jukebox.

Powder Snow Walking: You can walk on powder snow without sinking.
codex.form.my_addon.allay_sp.cons:
Price of the Spirit:

Fragile Constitution: Your maximum health is lower.

Slow Mining: Your mining speed is reduced, even more so while flying.

Melee Weakness: Melee damage is reduced when using advanced weapons.

Equipment Limitation: You cannot equip leggings or boots.
codex.form.my_addon.allay_sp.instincts: You crave the glow of amethyst, and music is the source of your power. You feel light as a feather, as if you could float into the sky at any moment.
power.my_addon.form_allay_sp_purify.name: Mass Purification
power.my_addon.form_allay_sp_purify.desc: Charge for 1.5 seconds to purify all entities within a 15 block radius, clearing all potion effects and interrupting other SP form abilities. Movement speed reduced by 50% while charging. Press again to cancel. 30s cooldown.
Charge for 3 seconds to consume all mana and heal all living entities within a 15 block sphere for 20 HP. 50% slow while charging. Experience orb ding sounds indicate charge progress. Healed entities emit heart particles. Interrupted by damage (5s cooldown). 30s cooldown.
power.my_addon.form_allay_sp_amethyst_sh: You can only eat Amethyst Shards. Other food is inedible to you.
item.ssc_addon.allay_heal_wand.tooltip: Right-click to heal the targeted entity
tooltip.ssc_addon.allay_jukebox.desc: Drag a music disc onto this item in inventory to charge
power.my_addon.form_allay_sp_emergency_f: Consumes 50 Mana to restore 1 Food (0.5 Shanks) and pauses Mana Regeneration for 3.5s.
message.ssc_addon.join.beta_test: This version is a beta test. If you can, please help test the SP Allay's totem resurrection mechanism. SP Allay can right-click with a totem to activate it. When activated, it will resurrect players within a 20-block radius and consume the totem. You can use commands or the newly added 'Add Ally Mark' in the addon pack to add a whitelist. When players are in the whitelist, other units' buff effects will be blocked. If there are any issues, please help by opening an issue on GitHub to help me improve this mod, thanks! When you open an issue, please attach your log file to help me locate the problem faster, thanks!
